## Intermediate2Options.srcOptions property

`gulp.src` options for process output files. Options for `gulp.src` for reading files from [output](./gulp-intermediate2.intermediate2options.output.md) temp directory after processing.

**Signature:**

```typescript
srcOptions?: vfs.SrcOptions;
```
